title: Gather Your Allies
content: dians: Save the Gondians from Iron Throne and disabled the steel watchers. A friendly Steel Watcher (after patch #7) Zevlor: Save the Emerald Grove in Act 1, then rescue him in the Mind Flayer Colony in Act 2. Hellrider Platoon - Summon one Hellrider Cleric at level 10, one Hellrider Paladin at level 10, and Zevlor (paladin) at level 11 Zhentarim: Side with Zhentarim in Aid the Underduke.
